description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

@Icon[type:language-dependent] @Icon[type:mind-affecting] @Icon[type:sense-dependent]

Your quips make your enemies’ wounds feel even worse. As a reaction when you or an ally hits and deals damage to a creature affected by your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.TRq58BtMBgHi9dYc]{Vexing Style (Ex)}, you can increase the attack’s damage by an amount equal to your Charisma modifier. If the creature is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.yUtkoIshf4dPruNd]{Off-Target}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken} due to your actions (such as your demoralizing the creature or using the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.spGhGxCjrJUQP9v8]{Dispiriting Taunt (Ex)} improvisation), you can instead roll your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.OzwMoyrdE3fcNZLP]{Expertise} die and apply the result as a bonus to the attack’s damage. After a creature takes extra damage from this improvisation, it becomes immune to your injury to insult for 24 hours. You cannot apply this bonus to damage weapon attacks that affect an area, such as those with the explode or line special weapon properties.

You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hH0Ayhw714FWm7wb]{Improved Vexation (Ex)} improvisation to choose this improvisation
